activities: Coherent, Inc. recieves personal HR data from EU countries regarding our employees to be used strictly for internal employment related services and administration.  Coherent also receives personal customer data from the EU to complete business transactions, supply information and generally communicate with current and future customers.
eucountries: Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)Electronics Industry Prod/Test Equipment - (EIP)Telecommunications Equipment - (TEL)
privacyprograms: Coherent adheres to its own privacy policy.  It is not a member of an independent privacy program.
recoursemech: Coherent will comply with legal and regulatory authorities that provide for handling individual complaints and dispute resolution.  The Company will further cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU or their authorized representatives.
